documentation.text:
@notice send a subscribtion to this guild by sender
@param description short text for subscription

@dev direct call (not by proxy contract)
@notice send an un-subscription to this guild by sender

@dev direct call (not by proxy contract)
@notice put wei in this contract, accessible only by sender

@dev direct call (not by proxy contract)
@notice retrieve money sended by user on this contract

@notice return id of this contract
@return id number key of this contract

params._to: address of user you want to add member to this guild
address of member you want to change grade
params.grade: grade id you want to set for this member

params._id: key of grade you want to get

returns._0: Grade structure of grade with parameters
id number key of this contract

params.member: address of member you want to get

returns._0: Member member structure (can be empty stuct)

params._boolNumber: key of bool you want to set
params._packedBools: pack of boolean contained into this uint256

params._id: key id of grade mapping you want to set
params._packedBools: pack of boolean contained into this uint256
params.name: name of this grade

params._to: address of member you want to kick

addMember(address).notice: add member to this guild only if we have grade for this

changeGrade(address,uint8).notice: change grade of one user if you have right

getAllMembers().notice: return all members valid of this guild

getAllSubscriptionStruct().notice: return all subscription strucuture of this guilds

getOneMember(address).notice: return one member of this guild

isOwner(address).notice: check if owner is creater of this guild contract

sendETHInChest().notice: put wei in this contract, accessible only by sender

setBoolean(uint256,uint256,bool).notice: use this function external view to prepare uint256 of bool to set grade

subMember(address).notice: kick a member from this guild but keep datas, only set valid param to false but we send their money, we are not savage

suscribe(string).notice: send a subscribtion to this guild by sender

unsuscribe(uint256).notice: send an un-subscription to this guild by sender

validMember(bool,uint256).notice: validate or not a member in this guild

withdrawETHMyChest(uint256).notice: retrieve money sended by user on this contract
